responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "E62CFD464D94206421514A99A35A4348", "Simple enough. Take those basic gathering tools I gave ya and get yourself out into the wilderness, the foothills around the old Veinbreaker Mines are a good spot, but for the love of all stone, stay out of the mine entrance itself! It\'s crawling with those hostile Clay Dwarves. Stick to the surface, where it\'s a bit safer. Bring me back a small bundle of useful materials, and show me you\'re worthy of those tools. A fair trade, I reckon. It\'ll show you\'ve got the knack for it, and it\'ll help our stocks.")
name: ANV_FTUE_Dunir_GarrimHammersong_7_Response
